name: An Other Golf Game
summary: An Other Golf Game is not your typical openish world sandbox life-sim survival golf game experience featuring permadeath. You'll learn the art of golf on your own terms: picking clubs, assessing the wind, and, of course, tracking down that stray ball no matter where it lands. It’s a game for those who want to discover, adapt, and make every inch of progress on their own.
